title: Guideline-based treatment recommendations (e.g., AHA, USPSTF)
summary: Clinical Decision Support: Guideline-based treatment recommendations (e.g., AHA, USPSTF)
description: Implement guideline-based treatment recommendation engine that provides evidence-based treatment suggestions aligned with established clinical guidelines such as AHA (American Heart Association) and USPSTF (U.S. Preventive Services Task Force) recommendations.
